tasks.title: Implement `create_subtitles` Script
tasks.description: Create a Python script that takes a video file and uses whisper.cpp to generate a `source.srt` file.
tasks.details: The script should be executable from the command line. The output `source.srt` must be a standard SRT file.
tasks.testStrategy: Execute the script with a sample .mp4 file. Verify that a `source.srt` file is generated.

tasks.title: Implement `llm_correction` with Gemini API
tasks.description: Develop the Python script for `llm_correction`. This script will parse the `source.srt` file, send only the dialogue text to the Gemini API for correction, and then reconstruct a `cleaned.srt` file, preserving all original timestamps.
tasks.details: Implements P.2.1 and P.2.2. The script must include robust SRT parsing/reconstruction logic. The prompt sent to Gemini must contain strong instructions to only correct grammar and phrasing, without altering the timecodes.
tasks.testStrategy: Process a sample `source.srt` file. Compare the input `source.srt` and output `cleaned.srt` files. Verify that timestamps are identical, and only the dialogue text has been modified.
